title: Recording Software
body:
Basically I want a software to record my whole games, so i can go back and watch them to get better, and i also want a software that has a hotkey setting to record highlights in game so i can record funny moments and good plays. If anyone could recommend some software that would be awesome, preferably free or not subscription based but anything atm would be nice. 

thanks :)

replies.body:
OBS is what a lot of streamers and youtubers use to record and stream their games.
It's totally free and pretty much everything you want.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q0kC6_U-UKE here's a video from the Fresco himself giving an in-depth guide on it.

Are you on a PC or Mac? If you're not looking for live gameplay recording I know a large amount of mainstream software that you can get (other than FRAPS....) which might be of use. Otherwise Steezy has some great suggestions!

if you want live gameplay, OBS.
if you want spectator mode recording, lolreplay.
for recording funny moments only, shadowplay has a feature where it records the last 5 minutes of gameplay.
